comments: Sequence of indices n where a(n-1)<a(n) appears to be given by A003156. [From Joerg Arndt, May 11 2010]
references: L. Carlitz, R. Scoville and V. E. Hoggatt, Jr., Representations for a special sequence, Fib. Quart., 10 (1972), 499-518, 550.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) a(n)=if(n<3,1,n-a(a(n-1))-a(a(n-2)))(Haskell)a003160 n = a003160_list !! (n-1)a003160_list = 1 : 1 : zipWith (-) [3..] (zipWith (+) xs $ tail xs)   where xs = map a003160 a003160_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 02 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
